form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE OF AN ALIEN, FORM 1-550 ( (REV. 2-1-73)N

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE FORM APPROVED. IMMIGRATION ANDIdNATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43-RO368 O DATE FILED FEE STAMP APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE priority OF AN ALIEN date of In connection with immigrant visa application(s) of my 11-15-74 relative(s) listed in item 15 below, I request that the American Consul at MEXICO D. F. be furnished lawful admission into the United fee a verification pd of my (City and Country abroad) States for permanent residence. I have read and fully understand the instructions appearing on the reverse of this form concerning the desirability of attaching documentary evidence to prove relationship if the immigrant visa applicant is my parent, spouse, or unmarried child under the age of 21 years. 1. MY NAME IS (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 2. MY ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IS: SANCHEZ RAFAEL VEGA A-13-073 : 3. MAILING ADDRESS IN U.S. (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) 459 No. ROOSEVELT ST. OXNARD, CALIFORNIA. 93030 4. PERMANENT ADDRESS IN THE U.S. (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) 459 No. ROOSEVELT ST. XNARD, CALIFORNIA. 93030 5. MY DATE OF BIRTH IS: (Month) (Day) (Year) 6. MY PLACE OF BIRTH WAS: (City) (Country) 7. I AM NOW A CITIZEN OF: (Country) 5/26/1914 MEXICO. MEXICO. 8. MY FATHER'S NAME: 9. MY MOTHER'S FULL MAIDEN NAME: ESTEBAN XXX SANCHEZ PUDENCIANA BEGA DATA RELATING TO MY ADMISSION INTO THE UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR MY ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS TO PERMANENT RESIDENT 10. NAME USED WHEN ADMITTED FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS TO PERMANENT RESIDENT: 11. MY U.S. PORT OF ARRIVAL WAS: (Last) (First) (Middle) SANCHEZ RAFAEL VEGA CALEXICO 12. MY DATE OF ARRIVAL OR/AD USTMENT WAS: (Month) (Day) (Year) AND THE MEANS OF ARRIVAL WAS: (Show Name of Vessel or Airline and Flight No., etc.) MARCH 17, 1962. AT. Foot 13. NAME AND ADDRESS OF PERSON IN THE U.S. TO WHOM I WAS DESTINED COASTAL GROWERS Ass'n. OXNARD, CALIFORNIA. 2-19-76WK 14. I first obtained an immigrant visa at a United States consular office abroad on (date) (location). At that time, I was was not married. MEXICO. D.F. MARCH 2, 1962 15. Including my present marriage I have been married ONE times. The name of my present spouse is: ROSA MARTINEZ to whom I was married on 6/9/39 at URIANGATO GUANAJUATO MEX. My present spouse is (Check One) (date) (location) a U. S. Citizen a permanent resident neither of these. If married more than one time, list names of previous spouse(s) and places and dates of marriage and explain how marriage(s) were terminated: 16. THE PERSONS IN WHOSE BEHALF SUCH INFORMATION IS REQUESTED ARE AS FOLLOWS: FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH ARTURO SANCHEZ ZAVALA SEPTEMBER 1, 1968 YURIRIA GTO. MEX. RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS SON CONTADERO # 8. YURIRIA GUANAJUATO. MEXICO. FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS NOT TO BE FILLED OUT BY APPLICANT 17. FULL SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT AS NOW USED The Secretary of State is hereby informed that the applicant named Refael V Danches above was was not lawfully admitted for permanent residence. His as "A" file shows date of first admission for permanent residence 3-17-62 symbol 0-1 issuing post and date of issuance of IV. mex D.7, 3-2-62 marital status at time of first admission - Single; Married; Divorced; Widowed. File does does not establish relationship between applicant herein and visa applicant.
